Quality Education.reason: The course states "The main goal of this course is to help students understand the primary research methods".
evidence: This course consists of three parts: [Empirical Methods]
In the first part, the course provides a brief overview of the primary empirical methods used in corporate finance research, with a focus on addressing endogeneity issues.
The main goal of this course is to help students understand the primary research methods and topics in the field of corporate finance.
